summary: Jules Bordet  was a Belgian doctor.
full_text:
Jules Jean Baptiste Vincent Bordet  was a Belgian immunologist and microbiologist. The bacterial genus Bordetella is named after him.
^ Oakley, C. L. . "Jules Jean Baptiste Vincent Bordet 1870-1961". Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 8: 18. doi:10.1098/rsbm.1962.0002.
title: Jules Bordet
